sense.def:
Stocks
so deleži v lastništvu nekega podjetja ali vložek, na katerega bo izplačan določen znesek obresti.

Trgovina, ki
stocks particular goods
, ima na zalogi določeno blago za prodajo.

seg.quote: Several shops in London stock large fittings.

sense.def:
A shop's stock
je celotna količina blaga, ki ga ima trgovina na voljo za prodajo.

seg.quote: ...selling a week's worth of stock in a single day.

sense.def:
To stock a shelf or cupboard
pomeni napolniti polico ali omaro s hrano ali drugimi predmeti.

seg.quote: I found part-time work, stocking shelves in supermarkets.
His locker was always stocked with screws.

sense.def:
A stock of things
je zaloga predmetov.

seg.quote: They want to conserve coal stocks during the miners' strike.

sense.def:
The stock
, iz katerega prihaja človek ali žival, je vrsta ljudi ali živali, katerih potomec je.

seg.quote: He came from sturdy, peasant stock.

sense.def:
Živali, ki jim imamo na kmetiji, imenujemo
stock
.

Stock
je tekočina, ki nastane pri kuhanju mesa, kosti ali zelenjave v vodi.

A stock expression or way of doing something
je eden od načinov izražanja ali početja, ki je v splošni rabi.

seg.quote: ‘Wild and wanton’ was a stock phrase of the time.

sense.def:
Kadar je blago
in stock
v neki trgovini, je na voljo za prodajo. Kadar je blago
out of stock
, je razprodano.

To take stock
pomeni počakati in razmisliti o položaju, preden se odločimo, kaj bomo storili.

To stock up with something
pomeni kupiti zalogo nečesa.

seg.quote: Stock up with groceries and canned foods.
